import React,{useState} from 'react' import './NewPosts.scss' export default function NewPost() { const topics = ["art and culture", "human and nature", "technology", "science", "daily life", "society"] const [charLeft, setCharLeft] = useState(200) function handleChange(event){ let numChar = event.value.length; setCharLeft(200-numChar) } return (

New Posts

{charLeft} characters left

) }
